scripts.clean: npm run clean:lib && npm run clean:docs
scripts.babel: npm run babel:lib && npm run babel:docs
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run babel && npm run browserify
scripts.watch: npm run build && chokidar './index.js' './docs/index.js' './libES2015/**/*.js' './docs/libES2015/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build'
scripts.babel-debug: npm run babel:lib-debug && npm run babel:docs-debug
scripts.build-debug: npm run clean && npm run babel-debug && npm run browserify-debug
scripts.watch-debug: npm run build-debug && chokidar './index.js' './docs/index.js' './libES2015/**/*.js' './docs/libES2015/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build-debug'
